name: 7 3D Unity Games Bundle
description:
This bundle contains 7 Unity Games.

All these games are compatible for android, iOS, WebGL, PC, linux, macOS and many other platforms that Unity supports.

You get complete source code for each of these projects.

To open these project you will need Unity 2019.4.0 or any newer version.

1. Color Cube:

2. Shift The Shape:

3. Endless Maze:

4. Level Rotator:

5. Endless Tunnel:

6. 3D Breaker:

7. Dunk:

All these games are ready for release on play store, app store or any other store. You can reskin them and put ads in no time.
